summary: Ecosystem refers to a community of organisms interacting within a specific geographic area in biology. This concept is often extended to non-literal contexts like crypto, reflecting a desire for less hierarchical organizations. With the advent of the internet, modern ecosystems transcend physical boundaries, necessitating new models and tools inspired by various fields to support thriving, decentralized structures.
excerpt: An ecosystem in biology involves organisms interacting within a specific area. Its overuse in other contexts reflects a desire for less hierarchical structures. Modern ecosystems transcend space-time.
